docs.snippet: Greg McElroy and Matt Simms feel the same pressure and train with as much intensity as the better-known Mark Sanchez and Geno Smith....
docs.lead_paragraph: Greg McElroy and Matt Simms feel the same pressure and train with as much intensity as the better-known Mark Sanchez and Geno Smith.
docs.abstract: New York Jets quarterbacks Greg McElroy and Matt Simms, overshadowed by Mark Sanchez and Geno Smith, feel same pressure and train with as much intensity as their more closely watched teammates; one of pair will gain No 3 quarterback position, while other will hand in playbook.

headline.main: In the Jets’ Other Quarterback Battle, the Loser Will Hand In His Playbook
headline.print_headline: In the Jets’ Other Quarterback Battle, the Loser Will Hand In His Playbook

docs.snippet: The Giants are part of the trend of N.F.L. teams holding training camp at home at their permanent facilities rather than on a remote campus, but either location has its pros and cons....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Giants are part of the trend of N.F.L. teams holding training camp at home at their permanent facilities rather than on a remote campus, but either location has its pros and cons.
docs.abstract: New York Giants join several other NFL teams in holding their training camp at home, breaking with 80-year-old tradition in which team gather at remote location in spirit of summer camp camaraderie; choice comes with both pros and cons, but complex in East Rutherford, NJ, features undeniably superior facilities.

headline.main: Giants Stay Home for Summer Camp
headline.print_headline: Giants Stay Home for Summer Camp

docs.snippet: Eagles receiver Riley Cooper returned to the team on Tuesday after being caught on film yelling a racial slur at a concert....
docs.lead_paragraph: Eagles receiver Riley Cooper returned to the team on Tuesday after being caught on film yelling a racial slur at a concert.
docs.abstract: NFL Roundup; remorseful wide receiver Riley Cooper returns to Philadelphia Eagles following four-day excused absence to undergo sensitivity training after he was caught on film yelling a racial slur before a Kenny Chesney concert; other football news noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and KEN BELSON
